name: Organ Punk
description:
Organ Punk

Made for Ludum Dare 52 - Theme was "Harvest"

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/organ-punk

=============

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

E - Pickup / Drop

F - Harvest organs

=============

You are a black market organ dealer. Harvest organs from artificially grown humans. Keep your operating room clean of any organs to lower toxicity.
